ygData.subject: Re: Some praise and a few questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ROLF, ok ya got me :-) ************************************* Pinen Warsong Hopeless Bard of the Rathe Capt of the Noble Warriors of Norrath Bard of the 22nd
ygData.messageBody:
ROLF, ok ya got me :-)
*************************************
Pinen Warsong
Hopeless Bard of the Rathe
Capt of the Noble Warriors of Norrath
Bard of the 22nd Song
*************************************
Better? Thanks for all the help so far:-)) enjoy lunch
----- Original Message -----
From: John Tatsukawa
> From: "TommyC" <uber_sorcerer@...>
>
> OK I CAN"T TAKE IT...my Bard is level 22 my mage is 20 and
> has no problem Please read the whole post including the
> signature line :-)
> Lol. S'okay I just sat there with the "20th level" staring me in the face as
I wrote my response.

But if we're going to get picky, how can you be a Captain of a singular
"Noble Warrior of Norrath"?

I'm getting some lunch. :-)

---Windleaf "The hungry and evindentally non-comprehensive bard"
